# tailor_platform_machine_user (Resource)

The platform_machine_user resource represents a controlplane machine user that can be created at organization or folder level in Tailor Platform.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a machine user at organization level
resource "tailor_platform_machine_user" "org_bot" {
  name            = "org-bot"
  description     = "Machine user with organization-level access"
  organization_id = data.tailor_organization.example_org.id
}

# Create a machine user at folder level
resource "tailor_platform_machine_user" "folder_bot" {
  name            = "folder-bot"
  description     = "Machine user with folder-level access"
  organization_id = data.tailor_organization.example_org.id
  folder_id       = tailor_organization_folder.example_folder.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of this controlplane machine user.
- `organization_id` (String) The ID of the organization where the machine user will be created. Either organization_id or folder_id must be specified.

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of this controlplane machine user.
- `folder_id` (String) The ID of the folder where the machine user will be created. Either organization_id or folder_id must be specified.

### Read-Only

- `client_id` (String) The computed client ID of the machine user.
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive) The computed client secret of the machine user.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the resource.
